description: This file is a BitBake include file (.inc) used to modify image post-processing commands and configure syslog-ng settings during build.

methods.name: patch_syslog_ng_config
methods.description: Defines a function to patch SSL log configuration in syslog-ng configuration file.

methods.name: patch_ssl_log
methods.description: Removes a specific SSL endpoint line from the syslog-ng configuration file within the image root filesystem.
